  • Method Details

    • clamp

      public static float clamp​(float value, float min, float max)
      Clamps a number between the given min and max values.
      Parameters:
      value - the number to clamp
      min - lower bound
      max - upper bound
      Returns:
      value if min < value < max, min if value < min, max if value > max

    • lerp

      public static float lerp​(float first, float second, float amt)
      Linearly interpolates between first and second by amt. The parameter amt should be in the range [0, 1]. When t = 0, returns first. When t = 1, returns second. When t = 0.5, returns the midpoint of first and second. DoaEngine guarantees the result to be true if and only if the parameter amt is in the range [0, 1]. Parameter amt not being in the range [0, 1] is an undocumented behaviour and might give unexpected results.
      Parameters:
      first - start value
      second - end value
      amt - interpolation value between the two doubles
      Returns:
      the interpolated double result between the two double values

    • map

      public static float map​(float value, float sourceRangeMin, float sourceRangeMax, float destinationRangeMin, float destinationRangeMax)
      Maps a number from one range to another. Value not being in the range [sourceRangeMin, sourceRangeMax] is an undocumented behaviour and might give unexpected results.
      Parameters:
      value - the incoming value to be converted
      sourceRangeMin - lower bound of the value's current range
      sourceRangeMax - upper bound of the value's current range
      destinationRangeMin - lower bound of the value's target range
      destinationRangeMax - upper bound of the value's target range
      Returns:
      mapped number

    • randomBetween

      public static float randomBetween​(float lower, float upper)
      Returns a pseudo-random floating point number between the specified lower (inclusive) and upper (exclusive).
      Parameters:
      lower - the least value returned
      upper - the greatest bound (exclusive)
      Returns:
      a pseudo-random floating point number between the specified lower (inclusive) and upper (exclusive)

    • randomIntBetween

      public static int randomIntBetween​(int lower, int upper)
      Returns a pseudo-random integer between the specified lower (inclusive) and upper (exclusive).
      Parameters:
      lower - the least value returned
      upper - the greatest bound (exclusive)
      Returns:
      a pseudo-random integer between the specified lower (inclusive) and upper (exclusive)

    • toDegress

      public static float toDegress​(float radians)
      Calculates and returns the angle in degrees converted from the parameter.
      Parameters:
      radians - the angle to convert to degrees, in radians
      Returns:
      the angle in degrees

    • toRadians

      public static float toRadians​(float degrees)
      Calculates and returns the angle in radians converted from the parameter.
      Parameters:
      degrees - the angle to convert to radians, in degrees
      Returns:
      the angle in radians
